s.text: (Of course if the plan were successful, his Israeli critics would have thought he was a genius.)
(Of course if the plan were successful, his Israeli critics would have thought he was a genius.)
(Of course if the plan were successful, his Israeli critics would have thought he was a genius.)
Also drawing wide attention: the only segment of the compilation without a sound track is the one in which Clinton is seen meeting with John Huang.
In case you weren't sure, a "reefer" headline (that is, one referring to an inside story) on the front page of the NYT makes it official: "News Cycle Speeds Up."
The LAT , WP and NYT all feature front-page stories about Israel's botched attempt to kill the head of the political wing of Hamas in Amman, Jordan.

Arlen Specter's remark yesterday on CNN that with the latest flap, the White House "may have crossed the line of obstruction of justice" is quoted by USAT and the WP . The Post points out that such tapes were ostensibly covered by congressional committee subpoenas going back to last January, while the WSJ adds that Senate investigators had previously been told that no such tapes existed.
